item.title: squirrel
item.description: SKILL LEVEL: ⭐ SIZE: 8,5” / 22 cm tall when made with the indicated yarn. MATERIALS: Light worsted weight yarn in rusty red, cream, light brown and brown Size B-1 / 2.5 mm crochet hook Safety eyes (8 mm) Brown embroidery thread Yarn needle Pins Stitch marker Fiberfill for stuffing squirrel pattern head (start in cream yarn) Rnd 1: start 6 sc in a magic ring [6]
